statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sales_quantity > 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, sales_date FROM SalesData WHERE sales_quantity < 5 ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sales_quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT sales_date, sales_quantity, sales_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sales_amount > 100 ORDER BY sales_quantity ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id, product_name FROM SalesData ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, sales_quantity FROM SalesData WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, sales_date, sales_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sales_quantity > 50 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, sales_quantity, sales_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sales_quantity <= 20 AND sales_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sales_quantity = 10 AND sales_amount < 500 ORDER BY sales_date ASC, product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, sales_quantity, sales_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sales_amount >= 2000 ORDER BY product_name DESC, sales_quantity ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE quantity_sold > 100;
SELECT product_name, sales_date FROM products WHERE unit_price < 50.00 ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_sold FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 20.00 AND 30.00 ORDER BY quantity_sold ASC;
SELECT category_name, product_name FROM product_categories JOIN products ON product_categories.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY sales_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT product_name, unit_price, quantity_sold FROM products INNER JOIN product_categories ON products.product_id = product_categories.product_id WHERE product_categories.category_name = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE quantity_sold BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM products GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity_sold > 1000;
SELECT product_name, sales_date FROM products WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_price FROM sales_data WHERE sale_price > 100;
SELECT product_id, sale_price FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_name, sale_price FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_price > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, sale_price FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sale_price ASC
SELECT product_id, SUM(sale_price) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM sales_data WHERE sale_price < 50
SELECT product_name, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM SalesData
SELECT product_id, sale_amount FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT category_name FROM Categories WHERE category_id = 1
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM Products JOIN Categories ON Products.category_id = Categories.category_id
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM Trends
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM Products p JOIN SalesData s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.sale_amount > 100
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM Products p JOIN Categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id ORDER BY category_name
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM Trends WHERE LENGTH(trend_description) > 50

SELECT category_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM Categories c JOIN Products p ON c.category_id = p.category_id JOIN SalesData s ON p.product_id = s.product_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products WHERE unit_price > 100;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM Products WHERE stock_quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM Orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, stock_quantity FROM Products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT Orders.order_id, Customers.customer_name, Orders.total_amount FROM Orders JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM SalesTrends WHERE trend_start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT Product.product_name, OrderDetails.quantity, OrderDetails.subtotal FROM Product JOIN OrderDetails ON Products.product_id = OrderDetails.product_id WHERE OrderDetails.quantity > 5;
